name: Patient Path NYC
description: Professional patient advocacy services for hospitalized patients in New York City. Board certified independent patient advocate offering personalized care coordination, medical crisis management, and discharge planning.

founder.name: Shlomit Liberty
founder.description: Board Certified Independent Patient Advocate specialized in complex medical conditions, personal medical crisis management, and care navigation. Medical Speech Language Pathologist with more than a decade of healthcare experience.

alumniOf.name: New York University
alumniOf.department: Clinical Master's Degree in Speech Language Pathology

hasCredential.name: Certificate of Clinical Competence in Speech-Language Pathology (CCC-SLP)

itemOffered.name: Getting Started - Initial Consultation
itemOffered.description: Free 20-minute intake meeting where we answer your questions and explain our process. In-depth review of medical history and current status. Work with you and your family to understand your options and wishes. Help communicate your choices to your team.

itemOffered.name: Hospital Care Management
itemOffered.description: Continuous tracking of medical status with daily medical chart reviews and team communication. Ensure treatment plans are being followed. In-person hospital visits as needed. Attend family meetings and help resolve conflicts.

itemOffered.name: Discharge Planning and Recovery Support
itemOffered.description: Ensure discharge plan is safe and aligned with your goals. Research and advise next steps - at home or in a facility. Connect you with network of specialists. Stay actively involved until you safely transition to appropriate next level of care.

availableService.name: Medical Chart Review
availableService.description: Daily review of medical records, physician entries, nursing updates, labs, imaging, and medication administration records

availableService.name: Care Team Communication
availableService.description: Direct communication with physicians, nurses, therapists, and case management staff to ensure coordinated care

availableService.name: Family Meeting Facilitation
availableService.description: Attendance and facilitation of family meetings to ensure clear communication and decision-making
